column2: "That was great work! Thanks to your help, I was able to confirm that the venue is A-OK for safety!"
"It might not seem like much, but I know this will help everyone. Thank you very much!"
"However, there's much more to do. So many more people still need our help to make Valentine's Day special!"
"I can't contain this feeling! I just want to see everyone out there enjoying Valentine's Day!"
"So I'm going to do my best to make that happen! Please keep helping me!"
